price: 42. Mpe lisusu kanisa tango ba anzelu balobaki: Eh Maryam! Ya sôló Allah aponi yo mpe apetoli yo, mpe atomboli yo yambo ya basi banso ya mokili.(1)
arabic: وَإِذۡ قَالَتِ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ يَٰمَرۡيَمُ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱصۡطَفَىٰكِ وَطَهَّرَكِ وَٱصۡطَفَىٰكِ عَلَىٰ نِسَآءِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh qālati al-malāikatu yāmaryamu inna al-laha iṣ'ṭafāki waṭahharaki wa-iṣ'ṭafāki ʿalā nisāi al-ʿālamīna
